• Analyzing code for high performance CONV, GEMM and non-linear operators Deep understanding of AI frameworks, preferably ONNX.
• Practical experience applying these concepts to solve real-world problems in the context of research or work experience.
• You should have experience in optimizing and accelerating CNN/Generative AI models.
• Person needs excellent cross team collaboration skills to succeed in this role.
• We are looking for a candidate who possesses strong engineering skills to tackle complex challenges on AI model development work.
• Experience with any of the following also a plus: LLMs, stable diffusion, NeRF, or text-to-video generation.
• AMD Partner Hub Authorized Distributors AMD University Program Experience on model compression, quantization, and end-to-end inference optimization.
• Strong experience in developing ML compiler for efficient network mapping on NPU Experience with deep learning framework, e.

• Minimum QualificationsAt least 3 years experience with each of the following:Contributing actionable insights to drive performance improvements in production environments.
• Bachelor’s degree required in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Statistics fields, or a related subject area, or we may consider an equivalent industry experience.
• Strong English communication skills (both written and verbal).
• Statistical analysis and modeling, including correlation analysis, clustering methods, probability theory, principal component analysis, outlier detection, and data visualization.
• Using ML approaches for statistical analysis.
• Ability to distill complex data analysis into clear, user-focused recommendations and visualizations that drive product enhancements.
• Proficiency with Python and numeric/statistical libraries like pandas, numpy, scipy, etc.
